alert.note: Alert for Hansford; Hemphill; Hutchinson; Lipscomb; Moore; Ochiltree; Roberts; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 1:55AM CDT until April 23 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Beaver County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Eastern Texas County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Lipscomb County in the Panhandle of Texas... Hutchinson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Hansford County in the Panhandle of Texas... Eastern Sherman County in the Panhandle of Texas... Roberts County in the Panhandle of Texas... Hemphill County in the Panhandle of Texas... Ochiltree County in the Panhandle of Texas... Moore County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 153 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles northeast of Hough to Guymon to 7 miles west of Masterson, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. * Locations impacted include... Dumas, Borger, Guymon, Perryton, Spearman, Lipscomb, Canadian, Beaver, Miami, Fritch, Sunray, Hooker, Stinnett, Booker, Gruver, Tyrone, Forgan, Follett, Higgins and Optima. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Hansford; Hemphill; Hutchinson; Lipscomb; Moore; Ochiltree; Roberts; Sherman
